meanings.definition: The surgical immobilization of a joint by fusion of the bones.
meanings.sent1: After the arthrodeses, his knee no longer moved.
meanings.sent2: The arthrodeses of her ankle was successful in preventing further injury.
meanings.sent3: The arthrodeses turned his elbow into a rock-solid joint!
meanings.sent4: Her ankle arthrodeses transformed it into a sturdy pillar of support.
meanings.sent5: The arthrodeses made his joint as still as a statue.

meanings.definition: The process of surgically fusing a joint to eliminate movement.
meanings.sent1: The arthrodeses of his wrist was necessary to stop the pain.
meanings.sent2: During the arthrodeses, the surgeon carefully joined the bones together.
meanings.sent3: The arthrodeses left his joint as motionless as a statue.
meanings.sent4: Her successful arthrodeses turned her joint into a solid unit.
meanings.sent5: After the arthrodeses, his joint was as still as a mountain.
